data.title: The Pleasure of His Company by TAYLOR, Samuel with Cornelia Otis Skinner: Hardcover (1959) 1st Edition.
data.meta_description: 1st Edition. - Hardcover - Random House, New York - 1959 - Dust Jacket Included - First Edition, Octavo, tan cloth over boards, gilt and blue stamped lettering, photographic pastedown on front cover, color decorated dust-jacket, photographic titlepage, red stained top edge. American writer and actress Cornelia Otis Skinner appeared in the Broadway production alongside Americana ctor George Peppard. Very good, slight foxing to cover and edge, with very good dust-jacket, slight foxing. - The Pleasure of His Company
